tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE encrypted_data ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  sensitive_info VARCHAR(255) ENCRYPTED, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE encryption_keys ( 
  key_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  encryption_key VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE data_transmissions ( 
  transmission_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  encrypted_data_id INT REFERENCES encrypted_data(id), 
  encryption_key_id INT REFERENCES encryption_keys(key_id), 
  transmission_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
